    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Controller
    Application controller that redirects the user to different pages depending on the actions they want to perform, such as adding, editin or deleting persons.
    EncryptPassword
    Deprecated.
    This is a temporary class and will be modified in a future version, where dynamic user creation will be implemented
    IPersonDao
    Interface to access the data of the entity Persona Persona Spring automatically implements this interface when the app is executed Persona is the class type, and Long is the type of the primary key of the table in the DB that is connected to this class
    IPersonService
    Service interface for people management with CRUD operations Defines the operations related to the entity Persona
    IUserDao
    Interface that extends JpaRepository to provide advanced CRUD and JPA operations Spring automatically implements this interface when the app is executed Usuario is the class type, and Long is the type of the primary key of the table in the DB that is connected to this class
    PeopleManagementApplication
     
    Persona
    JPA entity that represent a Person in the system This class is mapped to the 'persona' table in the MySQL DB It includes autogenerated id, and the necessary data to create a Persona object to be saved in the DB It is serialized by the implementation of Serializable The Data Lombok annotation automatically generates the getters, setters, toString, equals and hashCode methods
    PersonService
    Implementation of the IPersonService to manage CRUD operations related to the entity Persona This class interacts with the data access layer through IPersonDao and handles transactions by using Transactional Spring annotations
    Rol
    JPA entity that represent a User's rol in the system This class is mapped to the 'rol' table in the MySQL DB It includes autogenerated id, and the name of the user to be saved in the DB It is serialized by the implementation of Serializable The roles are used to control access to specific functionalities within the app (ADMIN or USER) The Data Lombok annotation automatically generates the getters, setters, toString, equals and hashCode methods
    SecurityConfig
    Class to configure the app's security using Spring Security defining authorization, authentication and session management rules
    UserDetailsServiceImpl
    Implementation of the UserDetailsService used by Spring Security to authenticate users from the DB Retrieves a user by their username and uses it to construct an objet along with their password and roles
    Usuario
    JPA entity that represent a User in the system This class is mapped to the 'usuario' table in the MySQL DB It includes autogenerated id, the user's username, password and assigned roles It is serialized by the implementation of Serializable The Data Lombok annotation automatically generates the getters, setters, toString, equals and hashCode methods
    WebConfig
    Handles application language switching using interceptors, and general configuration of Spring MVC controller routes
